name: Belated Brew
description:
Belated Brew made by 4 students from Priestley College in Warrington UK. These are second year and students taking a Btec level 3 in Game Design. This is their first attempt at a Game Jam ran over 4 days. They were given the theme "Coffee Dreams Zombie Screams". They had 28 hours directed time to build it.

Description: Your late for work and your in desperate need of coffee but no time to make it, your only option is to steal it but be careful the cops are on your tail.

This is working Prototype, there maybe be bugs we plan to fix and an update will be available soon. This is what we had at the end of the Jam. Hope you enjoy.
